snippet: Digital technology is changing movies in such groundbreaking ways that “film” is usually a word of convenience and tradition.
abstract: Manohla Dargis and A O Scott discuss how digital technology is changing the business of movie making.

byline.original: By MANOHLA DARGIS and A. O. SCOTT

lead_paragraph: Digital technology is changing movies in such groundbreaking ways that “film” is usually a word of convenience and tradition.

headline.seo: How Digital Is Changing the Nature of Movies
headline.main: Film Is Dead? Long Live Movies
headline.print_headline: Film Is Dead? Long Live Movies
